main.name: Draw
main.description: `Game.Draw` holds all the drawing logic of the Game, provided by a `Draw` plugin. The API is free to implement by the plugin, but one thing is required: after Init is called (if any), Draw.domElement must hold the DOM Element on which the Game will be drawn, so the user can add it to the DOM.

children.name: domElement
children.description: The DOM Element on which the Game will be drawn. Must be present after Init() has been called (if any).
